Articles.Content:
The hill is heavy.

The Hill Ton Hotel.

I am really starting to dread new pages.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-04-28T08:11:41Z" title="04/28/2022 08:11  AM" data-short="2 yr">April 28, 2022</time> by ColdJ**

most hills (and hotels) are much heavier than 1 ton.

but based on visual inspections, the Hill Ton Hotel is the size of a regular hotel/hill

with your hill/hotel weighing 1 ton, the only conclusion is that the hill is made of an extremely light material (and also lighter than air)

the hill floats off into space. space hill (technically it would be an asteroid)

a nearby space station owned by Space Kerbalisation Tech captures the hill and sends it on an escape trajectory from the sun

**Edited <time datetime="2022-04-28T09:26:22Z" title="04/28/2022 09:26  AM" data-short="2 yr">April 28, 2022</time> by Space Kerbalisation Tech**
Many Science Hill

Bodybuilders move in.

Manly Science hill.

Nerds move in.

Mainly Science Hill

Dolphins move in.

Marine Science Hill.

Space troopers land.

Ultramarine Science Hill

Top Chefs move in.

Ultra Marinated Hiill.

He's from South.

Red Hot Hilly Peppers

Elsa cools them down.

Frozen Hill.

i use rocket engines to melt the ice

vaporised hill

Recondensed and chilled.

Ice Fortress.
Ice Queen takes it.

The witch with the mirror moves in.

Crystal Palace.
Highly Ordered Microscopic Structure Palace

Backwards shrink ray.

Macro-hill
Command Script Hill

Lets split that up and start basic.

Binary Hill.

Nobody can't read it, but it was compiled.

Compiled Hill

Failed to compile

Error 404: Hill Does Not Exist
Imaginary Hill

I imagine it.

My hill.

You get awaken.

Awaken Hill
Wake boarding hill.

Many boards.

Board Hill
